title: Shootings at adjacent houses in span of three days unnerve some Florence residents
content:
Two shooting incidents on the same block last week have left some residents of a Florence neighborhood shaken.
“I think there are more problems because there are more rentals now,” said a woman who spoke on condition of anonymity. “We’ve been here about 40 years, and it’s getting to be that we really don’t know a lot of the people.”
